main event: An observation of a long, silver object without wings was reported in Santa Maria, California on July 22, 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 seconds during daylight,, The object was described as long and large,, The object made no sound during the sighting,, The sighting raised speculation of the object possibly being a Navy blimp,, The number of objects observed was one.
sighted object: a long, silver object without wings
witness description: A person on vacation from New Orleans, aged between 42-55
